description.value:
Can vary depending on climate, from Tent Liners, Heating Bricks, Sunscreen, Extra Blankets, insect repellent, heavy gloves, greatcoats, parkers, filtration plugs, rad pills ,etc.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Common

Notes: 10 T
